desc: 120% boost to Atk when BB gauge is above 50%, greatly boosts all elemental damage, 60% boost to Spark damage & raises Atk parameter limits to 160000

dictionary.lore:
A massive blade that is extremely unwieldy to all but the strongest and nimblest of warriors, it bears an uncanny resemblance to another famous sword known as the "Duster Sword".

Before the fateful battle between Shura and Hisui, this weapon was the bane of many great warriors. Though it is crafted from common steel, it shines radiantly with the focus and ambition of its former master. When Shura forsook his name to become the War Demon Shusui, he abandoned his weapon as well, leaving it to be discovered by the Summoner's Hall in an unnamed corner of Celgrad.

name: Shura's Blade
